projects.name: xbot-ai
projects.description: PL_Genesis Hackathon Winner (AI & Autonomous Infrastructure) & Founders Forge Top 15 Pick. Xbot AI is an AI-powered assistant for X (formerly Twitter) that fetches actual trends, generates posts via Gemini AI, and logs interactions on the NEAR blockchain. Users can interact with the bot by mentioning @.
